title: Average price for a full set of acrylics at nail salons in the U.S. 2006 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2014 to 2012.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2012 to 2010.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2010 to 2008.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2008 to 2006.
gold: How much are acrylic nails in the U.S. ? Nail salons in the U.S. charged an average price of 46.01 U.S. dollars for a full set of acrylics in 2019 . Nail salons in the U.S . The nail salon industry in the United States is a large and thriving industry , which is active across all 50 states .
